name: Himagsikan (Dirkheim)
description:
Himagsikan is a 2D side scroller, strategy fighting game situated during the Philippine-American War-era involving sending your soldiers to breach the enemy encampments to reclaim or defend the country’s territories. The game’s story revolves around exploring an alternative history of what may happen if the Philippines were able to win the war against the Americans.

Developers:

PROGRAMMER/GAME DESIGNER

Symon Timothy Del Valle

Rocky Marc Ian Delson

Nicandro Obzunar Jr.

ARTIST

Hannah Mistica

Destine Lorraine Santos

SOUND DESIGNER

Carl Alec Gutierrez
